rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Grand foyer with wheelchair-accessible ramp and wide doorways for smooth entry.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious central living area adjoining the balcony, suitable for joint family gatherings.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with direct access to kitchen, wheelchair accessible design.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped modern kitchen, open plan for easy movement and accessibility.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Private guest room with a balcony, designed with wheelchair-accessible facilities.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Larger master bedroom featuring a private balcony, Vastu-aligned placement for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional master bedroom with a spacious balcony and wheelchair-accessible interior.

openings.description: Large openings ensuring natural light and airflow as per Vastu principles.
